FuncDef:
The shutdown command deactivates a PVC.
The undo shutdown command activates a PVC.
By default, a PVC is activated on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before managing services on a PVC, such as debugging or terminating services, run the shutdown command to deactivate the PVC.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
After a PVC is deactivated, packets cannot be forwarded over this PVC. Therefore, exercise caution when running the shutdown command.
